title: Limerick of Legends
body:
There once was a place named Demacia,
Where Lux questioned Galio’s dysphasia.
Garen scoffed at her books,
Jarvan gave him shocked looks,
At the shouting Xin sighed under an acacia.

At a river rested the lady named Sona,
Shyvana ate her sandwich and condoned her.
Vayne kept making poses,
Poppy didn’t reach their noses,
And Fiora kept speaking about being a dueller.

Meanwhile in the province of Noxus,
Draven continued being the most obnoxious.
Kat argued with Cass,
Swain gave them both sass,
Darius just snored while unconscious.

The abode of Vladimir was quite busy,
At the table sat Urgot in a tizzy.
Vald cooked food for eight,
Sion ate just his plate,
LeBlanc sighed and gulped down her fizzy.

Any craziness was hardly comparable to Zaun,
Viktor smelled gunpowder in the morn.
Singed laughed with a potion,
Twitch smelled of dead ocean,
Mundo goes where he pleases he’s sworn

Revolution sparked in the heart of Piltover,
Heimerdinger showed off to Jayce his new rover.
Caitlyn bit on her cupcake,
Janna shielded Vi’s earthquake,
Again Jinx failed her hostile takeover.

Waves crashed against the cliffs of Bilgewater,
Fizz tricked around Nautilus like an otter.
Graves longed for his cigar,
Fortune finished the rum bar,
And Gangplank chumped oranges like a slaughter.

Heated was the weather in Shrima,
Rek’sai chased Taliya around like a prima.
Xerath shot about lightning,
Nasus didn’t think it enlightening
As Malzahar wandered about as his schema

Over at the tranquil land of Ionia,
Things couldn’t be any crazier.
“Noxus!” complained Varus,
Soraka distracted him with a parus,
As Karma played dress up with Irelia.

Meditating was Master Yi under a pagoda,
As Lee Sin drunk a delicious coconut soda.
The ninjas continued sparring,
Wukong’s cackling was jarring,
Ahri ignored them all humming a coda.

Over at the Void was the devouring beasts.
Kog’Maw sat with Cho’Gath for glorious feasts.
Kha’Zix kept drooling,
Vel’Koz gave a long schooling,
As Kassadin snuck out due to the reek of yeasts.

The Freljord was as chilly as always,
Gragas sharing everyone’s drinks for holidays.
Tryndamere grumbled at the bear,
As Ashe braided his hair,
And Volibear laughed on the floor in a craze.

Bustling Yordles scooted around Bandle City,
Tristana and Corki lead the defence committee.
Ziggs tossed ‘round hexplosives,
Rumble’s flames were corrosives.
But Teemo stopped all the chaos by being gritty.

In the Shadow Isles and alike were more creatures.
Evelynn, Hecarim, and Morde were strange features.
Yorick kept digging,
Maokai mended his rigging,
But Nocturne just liked haunting teachers.

But there was one man over all,
That his beard was just as tall.
The man of time,
Knows all of pantomime.
But one story he did remove and recall.

There once was a man named Zilean,
He did a dance named the ‘Thrilean’.
A day midst his dance,
It did loosen his pants,
Thus he held his head in shame thereafter.

replies.body: Lol this is so funny XD totally league in every way
